solution_line_template: Norma left {tshirts_left} T-shirts And twice as many sweaters, she took {tshirts_left} * {multiplier_twice}= <<{tshirts_left}*{multiplier_twice}={sweaters_left}>>{sweaters_left} sweaters
Adding the T-shirts and sweaters, Norma left {tshirts_left} + {sweaters_left} = <<{tshirts_left}+{sweaters_left}={total_left}>>{total_left} clothes

When she came back, she found {sweaters_found} sweaters And triple the number of T-shirts, she found {sweaters_found} * {multiplier_triple} = <<{sweaters_found}*{multiplier_triple}={tshirts_found}>>{tshirts_found} T-shirts
Adding the T-shirts and sweaters, Norma found {sweaters_found} + {tshirts_found} = <<{sweaters_found}+{tshirts_found}={total_found}>>{total_found} clothes
Subtracting the clothes she left from the clothes she found, {total_left} - {total_found} = <<{total_left}-{total_found}={missing_items}>>{missing_items} clothes are missing
